titleStmt.title: Honor rediviuus [sic] or An analysis of honor and armory. by Matt: Carter Esq.
Honor redivivus.
titleStmt.author: Carter, Matthew, fl. 1660.
Gaywood, Richard, fl. 1650-1680, engraver.

biblFull.extent: [10], 256, 247-251, [1] p., [8] leaves of plates : coats of arms (woodcuts)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Herringman 1660 and are to be sould by Henry Herringman at the Ancker on the lowest side of the New-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: The title page is engraved and signed "R. Gaywood fecit"; the plate is an altered version of the one first used in Wing C658.
With two handwritten pages at end.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
